授業方法: From the beginning of the semester, we plan to conduct classes face-to-face for the majority of the classes: however, if the rates of infection for the pandemic worsen, the possibility of needing to switch to online simultaneous two-way classes may need to be used. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes. Class will be conducted as part lecture and part pair and group discussion and collaborative work. Students will work in pairs and groups, and will discuss their research topics, as well as effective ways to write a research paper. The will give peer feedback on presentations and writing assignments. Students will be required to complete self-study activities from the textbook and other sources that are not covered in class. Research and much of the writing will also be done out of class.
